data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 70,500 souls living in the state of Krong Pailin with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Krong Pailin, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Krong Pailin, Cambodia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 69,058 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Krong Pailin.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Krong Pailin, Cambodia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Kui people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, convict the 1,442 believers in Krong Pailin to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Krong Pailin, Cambodia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Krong Pailin do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: Krong Pailin
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Hainanese, Han Chinese, Min Nan, Han Chinese, Hakka, Burmese, Lao Phuan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Hainanese (14,000), Han Chinese, Min Nan (145,000), Han Chinese, Hakka (600), Burmese (5,200), Lao Phuan (2,300)
